-= Bedroom =-
You are in a bedroom. A typical kind of place.

You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a chest drawer. You make out a closed antique trunk. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a king-size bed. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a king-size bed? The king-size bed is normal. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?

There is a closed wooden door leading east.
